Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.facebook.react.ReactFragmentActivity
    ReactFragmentActivity will be removed in 0.59 release. Use ReactActivity instead.
    com.facebook.react.ReactInstancePackage
    com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactSoftException
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIImplementationProvider
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.facebook.react.fabric.FabricUIManager.dispatchCommand(int, int, ReadableArray)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule.dispatchCommand(int, int, ReadableArray)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.NativeViewHierarchyManager.dispatchCommand(int, int, ReadableArray)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIImplementation.dispatchViewManagerCommand(int, int, ReadableArray)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIViewOperationQueue.enqueueDispatchCommand(int, int, ReadableArray)
    com.facebook.react.views.image.ReactImageManager.getCallerContext()
    use ReactCallerContextFactory instead
    com.facebook.yoga.YogaNode.getParent()
    Use #getOwner() instead. This will be removed in the next version.
    com.facebook.yoga.YogaNodeJNIBase.getParent()
    Use #getOwner() instead. This will be removed in the next version.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.ReactRoot.getSurfaceID()
    We recommend to not use this method as it is will be replaced in the near future.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule.getViewManagerRegistry_DO_NOT_USE()
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.DisplayMetricsHolder.getWindowDisplayMetrics()
    Use DisplayMetricsHolder.getScreenDisplayMetrics() instead. See comment above as to why this is not correct to use.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.common.ViewUtil.isRootTag(int)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule.measureLayoutRelativeToParent(int, Callback, Callback)
    This method will not be part of Fabric.
    com.facebook.react.bridge.BaseActivityEventListener.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)
    use BaseActivityEventListener.onActivityResult(Activity, int, int, Intent) instead.
    com.facebook.react.ReactInstanceManager.onHostDestroy()
    use ReactInstanceManager.onHostDestroy(Activity) instead
    com.facebook.react.ReactInstanceManager.onHostPause()
    Use ReactInstanceManager.onHostPause(Activity) instead.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule.playTouchSound()
    use SoundManager#playTouchSound() instead.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule.preComputeConstantsForViewManager(List<String>)
    com.facebook.react.fabric.mounting.MountingManager.receiveCommand(int, int, ReadableArray)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.ViewManager.receiveCommand(T, int, ReadableArray)
    com.facebook.react.bridge.Promise.reject(String)
    Prefer passing a module-specific error code to JS. Using this method will pass the error code "EUNSPECIFIED".
    com.facebook.react.bridge.PromiseImpl.reject(String)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule.removeSubviewsFromContainerWithID(int)
    This method will not be available in Fabric UIManager.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule.replaceExistingNonRootView(int, int)
    This method will not be available in Fabric UIManager.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setRotation(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setScaleX(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setScaleY(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setTranslateX(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager.setTranslateY(T, float)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.DisplayMetricsHolder.setWindowDisplayMetrics(DisplayMetrics)
    Use DisplayMetricsHolder.setScreenDisplayMetrics(DisplayMetrics) instead. See comment above as to why this is not correct to use.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule.viewIsDescendantOf(int, int, Callback)
    This method will not be part of Fabric.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIImplementation.viewIsDescendantOf(int, int, Callback)
    This method will not be implemented in Fabric.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.facebook.react.bridge.GuardedAsyncTask(ReactContext)
    com.facebook.react.fabric.GuardedFrameCallback(ReactContext)
    com.facebook.react.bridge.GuardedResultAsyncTask(ReactContext)
    com.facebook.react.bridge.GuardedRunnable(ReactContext)
    com.facebook.react.ReactActivityDelegate(Activity, String)
    com.facebook.react.views.image.ReactImageManager(AbstractDraweeControllerBuilder, GlobalImageLoadListener, Object)
    use ReactImageManager.ReactImageManager(AbstractDraweeControllerBuilder, GlobalImageLoadListener, ReactCallerContextFactory) instead.
    com.facebook.react.views.image.ReactImageManager(AbstractDraweeControllerBuilder, Object)
    use ReactImageManager.ReactImageManager(AbstractDraweeControllerBuilder, ReactCallerContextFactory) instead.
    com.facebook.react.views.text.ReactTextUpdate(Spannable, int, boolean, float, float, float, float, int)
    Use a non-deprecated constructor for ReactTextUpdate instead. This one remains because it's being used by a unit test that isn't currently open source.
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule(ReactApplicationContext, List<ViewManager>, UIImplementationProvider, int)
    com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIManagerModule(ReactApplicationContext, UIManagerModule.ViewManagerResolver, UIImplementationProvider, int)
